Welcome to Car-Speed-Detection’s documentation!¶

Using our library to detect the speed of your car!¶

Getting Started¶

Installation¶

Car-Speed-Detection is available on PyPI and can be installed via pip. See car-speed-detection.readthedocs.io to learn about system dependencies and installation alternatives and recommendations.

pip install car-speed-detection
